property.name: id
property.description: Auto generated 10 characters alphanumeric string

property.name: name
property.description: Entry name (Min 1 chars)

property.name: description
property.description: Entry description

property.name: userId
property.description: The ID of the user who is the owner of this entry

property.name: tags
property.description: Entry tags

property.name: adminTags
property.description: Entry admin tags can be updated only by administrators

property.name: type
property.description: The type of the entry, this is auto filled by the derived entry object

property.name: createdAt
property.description: Entry creation date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: rank
property.description: Calculated rank

property.name: totalRank
property.description: The total (sum) of all votes

property.name: votes
property.description: Number of votes

property.name: partnerData
property.description: Can be used to store various partner related data as a string

property.name: downloadUrl
property.description: Download URL for the entry

property.name: searchText
property.description: Indexed search text for full text search

property.name: licenseType
property.description: License type used for this entry

property.name: version
property.description: Version of the entry data

property.name: thumbnailUrl
property.description: Thumbnail URL

property.name: idEqual
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only a specific entry (identified by its entryId)

property.name: idIn
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving few specific entries (string should include comma separated list of entryId strings)

property.name: nameLike
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries while applying an SQL 'LIKE' pattern matching on entry names. It should include only one pattern for matching entry names against

property.name: nameMultiLikeOr
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries, while applying an SQL 'LIKE' pattern matching on entry names. It could include few (comma separated) patterns for matching entry names against, while applying an OR logic to retrieve entries that match at least one input pattern

property.name: nameMultiLikeAnd
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries, while applying an SQL 'LIKE' pattern matching on entry names. It could include few (comma separated) patterns for matching entry names against, while applying an AND logic to retrieve entries that match all input patterns

property.name: nameEqual
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving entries with a specific name

property.name: partnerIdEqual
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries which were uploaded by/assigned to users of a specific Kaltura Partner (identified by Partner ID)

property.name: partnerIdIn
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries within Kaltura network which were uploaded by/assigned to users of few Kaltura Partners (string should include comma separated list of PartnerIDs

property.name: userIdEqual
property.description: This filter parameter should be in use for retrieving only entries, uploaded by/assigned to a specific user (identified by user Id)

property.name: tagsLike
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries while applying an SQL 'LIKE' pattern matching on entry tags. It should include only one pattern for matching entry tags against

property.name: tagsMultiLikeOr
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries, while applying an SQL 'LIKE' pattern matching on tags. It could include few (comma separated) patterns for matching entry tags against, while applying an OR logic to retrieve entries that match at least one input pattern

property.name: tagsMultiLikeAnd
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries, while applying an SQL 'LIKE' pattern matching on tags. It could include few (comma separated) patterns for matching entry tags against, while applying an AND logic to retrieve entries that match all input patterns

property.name: adminTagsLike
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries while applying an SQL 'LIKE' pattern matching on entry tags, set by an ADMIN user. It should include only one pattern for matching entry tags against

property.name: adminTagsMultiLikeOr
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries, while applying an SQL 'LIKE' pattern matching on tags, set by an ADMIN user. It could include few (comma separated) patterns for matching entry tags against, while applying an OR logic to retrieve entries that match at least one input pattern

property.name: adminTagsMultiLikeAnd
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries, while applying an SQL 'LIKE' pattern matching on tags, set by an ADMIN user. It could include few (comma separated) patterns for matching entry tags against, while applying an OR logic to retrieve entries that match all input patterns

property.name: statusEqual
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries, at a specific {@link ?object=KalturaEntryStatus KalturaEntryStatus}

property.name: statusIn
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries, at few specific {@link ?object=KalturaEntryStatus KalturaEntryStatus}

property.name: typeIn
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving entries of few {@link ?object=KalturaEntryType KalturaEntryType} (string should include a comma separated list of {@link ?object=KalturaEntryType KalturaEntryType} enumerated parameters)

property.name: createdAtGreaterThanOrEqual
property.description: This filter parameter should be in use for retrieving only entries which were created at Kaltura system after a specific time/date (standard timestamp format)

property.name: createdAtLessThanOrEqual
property.description: This filter parameter should be in use for retrieving only entries which were created at Kaltura system before a specific time/date (standard timestamp format)

property.name: searchTextMatchAnd
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries while search match the input string within all of the following metadata attributes: name, description, tags, adminTags

property.name: searchTextMatchOr
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries while search match the input string within at least one of the following metadata attributes: name, description, tags, adminTags

property.name: parentJobId
property.description: When one job creates another - the parent should set this parentJobId to be its own id.

property.name: url
property.description: The URL where the notification should be sent to

property.name: data
property.description: The serialized notification data to send

property.name: pageSize
property.description: The number of objects to retrieve. Maximum page size is 50.

property.name: pageIndex
property.description: The page number for which {pageSize} of objects should be retrieved.

property.name: recipientId
property.description: kuserId

property.name: mediaType
property.description: The media type of the entry

property.name: conversionQuality
property.description: Override the default conversion quality

property.name: sourceType
property.description: The source type of the entry

property.name: searchProviderType
property.description: The search provider type used to import this entry

property.name: searchProviderId
property.description: The ID of the media in the importing site

property.name: creditUserName
property.description: The user name used for credits

property.name: creditUrl
property.description: The URL for credits

property.name: mediaDate
property.description: The media date extracted from EXIF data (For images) as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: dataUrl
property.description: The URL used for playback. This is not the download URL.

property.name: hasRealThumbnail
property.description: Indicates whether the user has submited a real thumbnail to the mix (Not the one that was generated automaticaly)

property.name: editorType
property.description: The editor type used to edit the metadata

property.name: dataContent
property.description: The xml data of the mix

property.name: id
property.description: Moderation flag id

property.name: userId
property.description: The user id that added the moderation flag

property.name: objectType
property.description: The type of the moderation flag (entry or user)

property.name: flaggedEntryId
property.description: If moderation flag is set for entry, this is the flagged entry id

property.name: flaggedUserId
property.description: If moderation flag is set for user, this is the flagged user id

property.name: status
property.description: The moderation flag status

property.name: comments
property.description: The comment that was added to the flag

property.name: plays
property.description: Number of plays

property.name: views
property.description: Number of views

property.name: width
property.description: The width in pixels

property.name: height
property.description: The height in pixels

property.name: duration
property.description: The duration in seconds

property.name: playlistContent
property.description: Content of the playlist - XML if the playlistType is dynamic text if the playlistType is static url if the playlistType is mRss

property.name: playlistType
property.description: Type of playlist

property.name: plays
property.description: Number of plays

property.name: views
property.description: Number of views

property.name: duration
property.description: The duration in seconds

property.name: extraData
property.description: Use this field to pass dynamic data for searching For example - if you set this field to "mymovies_$partner_id" The $partner_id will be automatically replcaed with your real partner Id

property.name: eventTimestamp
property.description: the client's timestamp of this event

property.name: sessionId
property.description: a unique string generated by the client that will represent the client-side session: the primary component will pass it on to other components that sprout from it

property.name: uniqueViewer
property.description: the UV cookie - creates in the operational system and should be passed on ofr every event

property.name: userId
property.description: the partner's user id

property.name: currentPoint
property.description: the timestamp along the video when the event happend

property.name: duration
property.description: the duration of the video in milliseconds - will make it much faster than quering the db for each entry

property.name: userIp
property.description: will be retrieved from the request of the user

property.name: processDuration
property.description: the time in milliseconds the event took

property.name: controlId
property.description: the id of the GUI control - will be used in the future to better understand what the user clicked

property.name: seek
property.description: true if the user ever used seek in this session

property.name: newPoint
property.description: timestamp of the new point on the timeline of the video after the user seeks

property.name: referrer
property.description: the referrer of the client

property.name: isFirstInSession
property.description: will indicate if the event is thrown for the first video in the session

property.name: name
property.description: Name of the uiConf, this is not a primary key

property.name: createdAt
property.description: Entry creation date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: updatedAt
property.description: Entry creation date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: adminTags
property.description: Admin tags can be updated only by using an admin session

property.name: createdAt
property.description: Creation date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: updatedAt
property.description: Last update date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

property.name: partnerData
property.description: Can be used to store various partner related data as a string

property.name: partnerData
property.description: Can be used to store various partner related data as a string

action.name: addFromUrl
action.description: Adds new media entry by importing an HTTP or FTP URL. The entry will be queued for import and then for conversion.

param.name: mediaEntry
param.description: Media entry metadata

param.name: url
param.description: An HTTP or FTP URL

action.name: addFromSearchResult
action.description: Adds new media entry by importing the media file from a search provider. This action should be used with the search service result.

param.name: mediaEntry
param.description: Media entry metadata

param.name: searchResult
param.description: Result object from search service

action.name: addFromUploadedFile
action.description: Add new entry after the specific media file was uploaded and the upload token id exists

param.name: mediaEntry
param.description: Media entry metadata

param.name: uploadTokenId
param.description: Upload token id

action.name: addFromRecordedWebcam
action.description: Add new entry after the file was recored on the server and the token id exists

param.name: mediaEntry
param.description: Media entry metadata

param.name: webcamTokenId
param.description: Token id for the recored webcam file

action.name: get
action.description: Get media entry by ID.

param.name: entryId
param.description: Media entry id

param.name: version
param.description: Desired version of the data

action.name: update
action.description: Update media entry. Only the properties that were set will be updated.

param.name: entryId
param.description: Media entry id to update

param.name: mediaEntry
param.description: Media entry metadata to update

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete a media entry.

param.name: entryId
param.description: Media entry id to delete

action.name: list
action.description: List media entries by filter with paging support.

param.name: filter
param.description: Media entry filter

action.name: upload
action.description: Upload a media file to Kaltura, then the file can be used to create a media entry.

param.name: fileData
param.description: The file data

action.name: updateThumbnail
action.description: Update media entry thumbnail by a specified time offset (In seconds)

param.name: entryId
param.description: Media entry id

param.name: timeOffset
param.description: Time offset (in seconds)

action.name: updateThumbnailJpeg
action.description: Update media entry thumbnail using a raw jpeg file

param.name: entryId
param.description: Media entry id

param.name: fileData
param.description: Jpeg file data

action.name: requestConversion
action.description: Request a new conversion job, this can be used to convert the media entry to a different format

param.name: entryId
param.description: Media entry id

param.name: fileFormat
param.description: Format to convert

action.name: flag
action.description: Flag inappropriate media entry for moderation

action.name: reject
action.description: Reject the media entry and mark the pending flags (if any) as moderated (this will make the entry non playable)

action.name: approve
action.description: Approve the media entry and mark the pending flags (if any) as moderated (this will make the entry playable)

action.name: listFlags
action.description: List all pending flags for the media entry

action.name: add
action.description: Adds a new mix. If the dataContent is null, a default timeline will be created.

param.name: mixEntry
param.description: Mix entry metadata

action.name: get
action.description: Get mix entry by id.

param.name: entryId
param.description: Mix entry id

param.name: version
param.description: Desired version of the data

action.name: update
action.description: Update mix entry. Only the properties that were set will be updated.

param.name: entryId
param.description: Mix entry id to update

param.name: mixEntry
param.description: Mix entry metadata to update

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete a mix entry.

param.name: entryId
param.description: Mix entry id to delete

action.name: list
action.description: List entries by filter with paging support. Return parameter is an array of mix entries.

param.name: filter
param.description: Mix entry filter

action.name: clone
action.description: Clones an existing mix.

param.name: entryId
param.description: Mix entry id to clone

action.name: appendMediaEntry
action.description: Appends a media entry to a the end of the mix timeline, this will save the mix timeline as a new version.

param.name: mixEntryId
param.description: Mix entry to append to its timeline

param.name: mediaEntryId
param.description: Media entry to append to the timeline

action.name: requestFlattening
action.description: Request a new flattening job, flattening is used to convert a video mix to a video file.

param.name: entryId
param.description: Mix entry id

param.name: fileFormat
param.description: Format to convert

param.name: version
param.description: Version to flatten (If not set, latest will be used)

action.name: getMixesByMediaId
action.description: Get the mixes in which the media entry is included

action.name: getReadyMediaEntries
action.description: Get all ready media entries that exist in the given mix id

param.name: version
param.description: Desired version to get the data from

action.name: addFromUploadedFile
action.description: Generic add entry using an uploaded file, should be used when the uploaded entry type is not known

action.name: get
action.description: Get base entry by ID.

param.name: entryId
param.description: Entry id

param.name: version
param.description: Desired version of the data

action.name: getByIds
action.description: Get base entry by comma separated entry ids.

param.name: entryIds
param.description: Comma separated string of entry ids

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete an entry.

param.name: entryId
param.description: Entry id to delete

action.name: list
action.description: List base entries by filter with paging support.

param.name: filter
param.description: Entry filter

action.name: updateThumbnailJpeg
action.description: Update entry thumbnail using a raw jpeg file

param.name: entryId
param.description: Media entry id

param.name: fileData
param.description: Jpeg file data

action.name: flag
action.description: Flag inappropriate entry for moderation

action.name: reject
action.description: Reject the entry and mark the pending flags (if any) as moderated (this will make the entry non playable)

action.name: approve
action.description: Approve the entry and mark the pending flags (if any) as moderated (this will make the entry playable)

action.name: listFlags
action.description: List all pending flags for the entry

action.name: start
action.description: Start a session with Kaltura's server. The result KS is the session key that you should pass to all services that requires a ticket.

param.name: secret
param.description: Remember to provide the correct secret according to the sessionType you want

param.name: type
param.description: Regular session or Admin session

param.name: expiry
param.description: KS expiry time in seconds

action.name: startWidgetSession
action.description: Start a session for Kaltura's flash widgets

action.name: add
action.description: UIConf Add action allows you to add a UIConf to Kaltura DB

param.name: uiConf
param.description: Mandatory input parameter of type KalturaUiConf

action.name: update
action.description: Update an existing UIConf

action.name: get
action.description: Retrieve a UIConf by id

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete an existing UIConf

action.name: clone
action.description: Clone an existing UIConf

action.name: list
action.description: Retrieve a list of available UIConfs

action.name: add
action.description: Add new playlist Note that all entries used in a playlist will become public and may appear in KalturaNetwork

action.name: get
action.description: Retrieve a playlist

param.name: version
param.description: Desired version of the data

action.name: update
action.description: Update existing playlist Note - you cannot change playlist type. updated playlist must be of the same type.

action.name: delete
action.description: Delete existing playlist

action.name: list
action.description: List available playlists

action.name: execute
action.description: Retrieve playlist for playing purpose

action.name: executeFromContent
action.description: Revrieve playlist for playing purpose, based on content

action.name: getStatsFromContent
action.description: Retrieve playlist statistics

action.name: add
action.description: Adds a user to the Kaltura DB. Input param $id is the unique identifier in the partner's system

action.name: update
action.description: Update exisitng user, it is possible to update the user id too

action.name: get
action.description: Retrieve user

action.name: delete
action.description: Mark the user as deleted

action.name: list
action.description: List users (When not set in the filter, blocked and deleted users will be returned too)

action.name: add
action.description: Add new widget, can be attached to entry or kshow SourceWidget is ignored.

action.name: update
action.description: Update exisiting widget

action.name: get
action.description: Get widget by id

action.name: clone
action.description: Add widget based on existing widget. Must provide valid sourceWidgetId

action.name: list
action.description: Retrieve a list of available widget depends on the filter given

action.name: search
action.description: Search for media in one of the supported media providers

param.name: search
param.description: A KalturaSearch object contains the search keywords, media provider and media type

action.name: getMediaInfo
action.description: Retrieve extra information about media found in search action Some providers return only part of the fields needed to create entry from, use this action to get the rest of the fields.

param.name: searchResult
param.description: KalturaSearchResult object extends KalturaSearch and has all fields required for media:add

action.name: searchUrl
action.description: Search for media given a specific URL Kaltura supports a searchURL action on some of the media providers. This action will return a KalturaSearchResult object based on a given URL (assuming the media provider is supported)

action.name: register
action.description: Register to Kaltura's partner program

action.name: update
action.description: Update details and settings of you existing partner

action.name: getSecrets
action.description: Retrieve partner secret and admin secret

action.name: getInfo
action.description: Retrieve all info about partner This service gets no parameters, and is using the KS to know which partnerId info should be returned

action.name: getUsage
action.description: Get usage statistics for a partner Calculation is done according to partner's package Additional data returned is a graph points of streaming usage in a timeframe The resolution can be "days" or "months"

param.name: resolution
param.description: accepted values are "days" or "months"

action.name: updatepassword
action.description: Update admin user password and email

param.name: newEmail
param.description: Optional, provide only when you want to update the email

action.name: resetPassword
action.description: Reset admin user password and send it to the users email address

action.name: login
action.description: Get an admin session using admin email and password (Used for login to the KMC application)

action.name: add
action.description: Add new bulk upload batch job

param.name: conversionProfileId
param.description: Convertion profile id to use for converting the current bulk

param.name: csvFileData
param.description: CSV File

action.name: get
action.description: Get bulk upload batch job by id

action.name: list
action.description: List bulk upload batch jobs

action.name: getClientNotification
action.description: Return the entries for a specific entry id and type

action.name: addImportJob
action.description: batch addImportJob action allows to add a BatchJob of type IMPORT

action.name: getExclusiveImportJobs
action.description: batch getExclusiveImportJob action allows to get a BatchJob of type IMPORT

param.name: processorLocation
param.description: The location name from which the batch-process is running. Is used for the locking mechanism

param.name: pocessorName
param.description: The name of the batch-process. Is used for the locking mechanism

param.name: maxExecutionTime
param.description: The maximum time in seconds the job reguarly take. Is used for the locking mechanism when determining an unexpected termination of a batch-process.

param.name: numberOfJobs
param.description: The maximum number of jobs to return.

param.name: partnerGroups
param.description: Set of rules for how to prefer some partner's jobs over others

action.name: updateExclusiveImportJob
action.description: batch updateExclusiveImportJob action updates a BatchJob of type IMPORT that was claimed using the getExclusiveImportJobs

param.name: id
param.description: The id of the job to free

param.name: processorLocation
param.description: The location name from which the batch-process is running. Is used for the locking mechanism

param.name: pocessorName
param.description: The name of the batch-process. Is used for the locking mechanism

param.name: entryStatus
param.description: Optional parameter if the entry of the batch should change

action.name: freeExclusiveImportJob
action.description: batch freeExclusiveImportJob action frees a BatchJob of type IMPORT that was claimed using the getExclusiveImportJobs

param.name: id
param.description: The id of the job to free

param.name: processorLocation
param.description: The location name from which the batch-process is running. Is used for the locking mechanism

param.name: pocessorName
param.description: The name of the batch-process. Is used for the locking mechanism

action.name: getGraph
action.description: report getGraph action allows to get a graph data for a specific report.

action.description: report getGraphs action allows to get a graph data for a specific report.

param.name: objectIds

action.name: getTotal
